description.value:
You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey. When you grant bonuses from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Monster Hunter], you and your allies also each gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Monster Warden]
